Tracing Coffee Origins

01 Oct 2025

Tags: dogs, cats, pets

If you’d like, I can show you a simple structure that combines your universal styles.css and your Jekyll overrides cleanly inside the _sass pipeline (so you maintain just one style system). Would you like that setup example? For a primary SCSS/SASS file (like a main.scss or style.scss that will eventually become a full CSS file) that you want Jekyll to render to a .css file, you must include the front matter, but it can be empty.
